title: Trzask stories
caption: Explore the creative world of Trzask, full of amazing stories, crazy ideas and unconventional projects that will infect you with inspiration and boost your will to act!

items.title: The sweetest star on the Internet
caption: #design #animation
The amazing story of a donut that is winning the hearts of Internet users in 3D social media animation

description.paragraph: If you're craving some online inspiration that's as sweet as it gets, you will definitely love this guy. Say ‚Äòhello‚Äô to Donut the Influencer - the first Internet donut star! üç©‚ú®
Dooti Donuts asked us to create a short animation for social media that would present their newest star in action and spread its sweetness to the ends of the Internet.

video.caption: Dooti Donuts - Influencer / Production: Trzask Studio (art direction, vfx, sound, animation, 3d modeling) 2023

description.paragraph: So, what's the deal with this donut star? Well, imagine a round pastry, topped with fabulously delicious strawberry shake flavor, and having more charisma than your favorite Hollywood idol.  It's been in showrooms... pardon, on store shelves for a hot minute, but let's just say - it's already making waves. What's the secret sauce? It's the first donut cooked up entirely by Dooti Donuts fans, straight out of the

We must have exploited that potential! The client wanted us to create an attractive and eye-catching animation with fashionable motifs and a youthful vibe. So we decided to take the viewers backstage to Donut the Influencer's work and show how our sweet star puts through the yummy donut hoops to win their hearts and likes. üëç‚ù§Ô∏è

text: creating a 3D animation that launches a brand-new donut into influencer stardom

description.paragraph: As the base of the video, we created a three-dimensional fluffy and appetizing Donut the Influencer‚Äôs figure in three positions. Then, we selected a few scenes typical for an Internet celeb‚Äôs life, added the animated Donut, and brought him to a sweet life. And so, our strawberry-topped Internet personality takes on a levitation challenge, poses for pictures like a pro, and even spills a few secrets on stream.

In each scene, we displayed the influencer's credo: style, challenge, live and fun, which, together with our client's slogan 'round and round', created a completely new, inspiring, donut influ-universe. We've drenched the scenes in colors as sweet as a strawberry shake and connected them with creative transitions. To emphasize the donutmosphere, we added neutral but catchy music, and for dessert, we turned up the magic of Donut the Influencer with a little sparkle. ‚ú®

quote.text: ‚ÄúThe idea for the animation was simple - to show the typical life of a completely unusual influencer. We used scenes related to the topic, but instead of human figures, we pasted a 3D animation of a strawberry shake-flavored donut. The effect is splendid!‚Äù

author.name: Piotr
author.role: Responsible for creative ideas and project implementation

left.title: Thumbs up if you liked it!

description.paragraph: The unique combination of the virtual world of influencers with the completely real sweetness of a donut made the animation an exciting trip to the universe of Donut the Influencer - the new star of the network. We tweaked the video dimensions for various platforms and creatively adapted its message to current trends in social media. It was a sweet pleasure working on the animation!

quote.text: ‚ÄúWhat I like most is how well our donut has settled into the real world. It does well in front of the camera and levitates with such ease! Fine, we had to kick out a few influencers to make room for our star, but it was totally worth it!‚Äù
‚ÄûThe animation has taken the virtual donut to a whole new level! It's magic; it‚Äôs Trzask! style!‚Äù

items.title: The advert you can taste!
caption: #design #animation #richmedia
Delicious madness with Tymbark Deli&Fruits! A 3D commercial about extraordinary flavors.

description.paragraph: Have you ever wondered what heaven in your mouth taste like? We delved into the insightful creative process to reveal that secret in a brand new 15-second spot for the
brand. The Maspex Group asked us to create a visually captivating and mesmerizing advertisement for Deli&Fruits mousse in 3 incredible flavors.

video.caption: Tymbark Deli&Fruits. Kiedy muuuusisz co≈õ s≈Çodkiego... / Production: Trzask Studio (vfx, sound, animation, 3D, storyboard) 2023

description.paragraph: Armed with pack shots and a key visual, we took a challenge to turn these static images into a dynamic and engaging spot that embodied the essence of pleasure, bliss, and lightness. We used juicy cherries, dried coconut flakes, and slices of ripe bananas to emphasize a rich flavor of the mousses. Are you already thrilled?

text: Delight the viewers' taste buds in a smooth and pleasant way

description.paragraph: We knew that the spot was supposed to stimulate the senses and capture viewers‚Äô imagination in just 15 seconds. So we created 3D animations featuring appetizing ingredients which fell and drowned in a spinning fluffy mass, and then mmmm‚Ä¶ they seamlessly integrated into an ultra-delicate mousse before the viewer's very eyes.

We used the soft texture and smooth movement of the mousse ingredients to reflect the lightness of the product. We suspended it in a state of weightlessness, and the deep voice of the narrator and relaxing, lifestyle music did their job!

quote.text: ‚ÄûThe challenge thrown down by Tymbark was incredibly difficult. Getting the fruit into the mousse and its interaction with the scenery required hours spent on post-production.‚Äù

author.name: Piotr
author.role: Responsible for creative ideas and project implementation

description.paragraph: The success of the spot exceeded expectations. The tasteful and energetic 3D animation resonated not only with online audiences but also with a broader television audience. Our work brought true pride to the entire team, and the tasty journey around the world of Deli&Fruits attracted the viewers to relish that smooth snack!

quote.text: Coworking with your team was efficient, creative, and punctual. It‚Äôs the TRZASK itself :)

items.title: Animation straight from apocalypse
caption: #animation #games
How to present a new platform to your fans so they fall in love with it? Check out our Dying Light 2 Stay Human case study!

description.paragraph: How to literally infect fans with a new game website? The word we used is not accidental, because it perfectly fits the topic we are discussing today. And it is‚Ä¶ Dying Light 2 Stay Human, of course!
One of the projects we are lucky to work on belongs to
, one of the top game developers in the world. And this time we were tasked with creating an animation that shows what the platform known as
is all about.

video.caption: Dying Light 2 Stay Human - Pilgrim Outpost / Production: Trzask Studio (animation, 2D/3D), Techland (script, gameplay) 2023

description.paragraph: The task we were given was simple: create an awesome trailer that would intrigue players and help introduce them to the new
service.

Pilgrim Outpost is a platform that allows players to earn points for completing in-game tasks and then exchange them for various rewards. Our task was to create a video that would not only interest players but also explain the rules of the new system.

text: to create an animation straight from the post-apocalypse that will encourage players to use the Pilgrim Outpost platform.

img.caption: The video sequences provided by Techland.

description.paragraph: The trailer was created based on a script and short video shots of the in-game character, generated from the game engine and provided by the Techland team.
But that's not all - we couldn't resist and added our own spark of Trzask creativity!
This time in the form of 3D models or spectacular highlights
And all this was to attract the recipient's eye as much as possible and focus their attention on key elements!

quote.text: ‚ÄûIdeas to diversify the video were developed throughout the entire process of creating the trailer. Highlighting the text at the end, animating a chest with weapons in 3D, or turning up the transition and matching everything with the music. The creative process does not end with the concept - it only starts there!‚Äù

description.paragraph: The finished animation exceeded our wildest expectations! Not only was the film standing out, but the scenes itself added emotion to the narrative. One of the effects we are most proud of is the infecting mask effect, which revealed sections of the story and captured the atmosphere of horror that players experience in Dying Light 2 Stay Human. This amazing cover effect highlights the spreading plague that we fight in the game!

3D animations are also ours! The moment with scattering tokens or the impressive rotation of the box came out of our hands, with only frontal photos as a reference. These tidbits added incredible dynamics to the story. The clever combination of gameplay with the website and token animation smoothly presented the advantages of the website, which is intended to build even more interesting experiences for the player.

quote.text: ‚ÄûIn the final moments of the video, we used flickering light effects. It is a quite simple and effective trick that is intended to focus more attention on the logo and the call to action button.‚Äù

description.paragraph: The effects of our work were presented during a Twitch stream promoting the new platform, which gathered great interest from the gaming community!
Being able to add another small brick to the game we love is something that always brings us great joy!

video.caption: Gut Feeling Update Stream, Developer Segment - Dying Light 2 Stay Human / Pilgrim (11')

quote.text: ‚ÄûThe animation‚Äôs premiere was on a Twitch stream, as part of a larger broadcast and presented the community with a new platform with its benefits for players. We wanted to create something that would show players the amazing rewards they can earn and make them want to check out the Pilgrim Outpost.‚Äù

author.name: Piotr
author.role: Responsible for creative ideas and project implementation

quote.text: ‚ÄûThe Trzask team once again positively surprised us with their creativity. Their proactive and professional approach to such an important project like Pilgrim Outpost is something that is particularly significant for us. The unconventional attitude of Piotr's team allowed for the creation of a great animation that perfectly reflects the world of Dying Light 2 Stay Human.‚Äù

items.title: Make your own donut and it'll tell you what it thinks
caption: #design #animation
Some want to talk to animals, we want to talk to donuts! Read the Dooti Donuts case study and find out how we did it!

description.paragraph: Ever wonder what it‚Äôd be like to talk to a donut? We do and we can honestly say that such a conversation would be very interesting! And we know it for sure, because it‚Äôs the kind of
we‚Äôve created based on sweetly-artificial intelligence and personas of our recipients. What's more, our creator won a statuette in the
2023 competition!
Read on and find out how one of our studio's most ambitious projects was created and how it generated 2.3 million events with 56,000 colorful donuts created as part of a Facebook competition.

video.caption: Dooti Donuts - Creator App / Production: Trzask Studio (concept, design, animation, programming, 3D), Stokson - brand owner (coordination of works), Get Hero (influencer materials), Adheads (promoting the competition, managing social media) 2023

description.paragraph: The first stage in our projects is always research, inspiration and concept. This is what we did after receiving a brief from

to create an interactive game for the brand's website. Together, we decided to design a creator in which recipients will be able to make their own, dream donut. But that‚Äôs not all! Donuts were supposed to have their own personalities and talk to people!

quote.text: ‚ÄûThe concept with bringing donuts to life really got us excited. Developing a vision, designing several hundred character variants, animating several dozen situations and programming the competition mechanism was an incredible challenge. Who if not us? Let‚Äôs go!‚Äù

author.name: Piotr
author.role: Responsible for the software of the main mechanism and artistic direction

description.paragraph: In order to better fit into the minds of our customers, we created four donut personas that were completely different from each other. Their behavior and vocabulary changed, associating them with specific behavioral features of given communities matching the target group. In total, we came up with almost 80 texts for our donuts, which responded to various scenarios and situations.

There were also sales items. If you arranged the original ‚Äúclothing‚Äù of a real donut from the Dooti Donuts offer, our friend would invite you to shop in the store and tell you his name! (e.g. Cookies).

quote.text: ‚ÄûWe love easter eggs, so we couldn't miss them here! After selecting the right sequence of elements, the donut receives a real gold chain. We wouldn't be ourselves if we didn't add a few 'cherry on tops' to this project.‚Äù

description.paragraph: Donuts in the

were ticklish, they could feel tired or bored, sometimes they were a bit picky, but if they liked something, they didn't fail to say it! We owe all of it to unique scripts that cleverly influenced characters‚Äô personalities.

quote.text: Each click and insertion of the add-on was checked by a unique character control engine and if the character decided that the donut had had enough or it tickled him, our hero reacted appropriately with movement and a message. It was the same when the recipient did nothing. Donut commented on literally everything!

description.paragraph: The whole activation with dressing up donuts was a support for the newly created
donut, and the creator had the task of making fans of the group fall in love with DOOTI DONUTS. Recipients took over and created their own dream donuts, inspired by their favorite GENZIE members.
Where's the carrot? We‚Äôve created a special camera! To win a prize, all you needed was a photo and a link in a Facebook

. Its special design allowed to display a thumbnail in the comment - thanks to this, others could immediately give a like! We saw immediately which one the community liked the most, making it easy to choose the most exceptional work. There were 8 prizes of 1,000 PLN each.

quote.text: The start of the competition itself was not accidental, because we started with all communication on June 2, i.e. on World Donut Day, which is a day that is of great importance to our brand!

description.paragraph: Our creator has become DOOTI DONUTS‚Äô communication tool. Both the contest and the creator were promoted on TikTok, Facebook, Instagram and even on Twitch!

The activation was also supported by GENZIE, which won young generation‚Äôs hearts last year. A number of their publications in social media added a strong boost to the campaign. The members had fun creating their character variants together, talking about it every now and then on their channels.
All these activities made the creator an absolute hit, where gameplay materials circulated on TikTok and Instagram!

quote.text: The creator gave the opportunity to enter recipients‚Äô own texts, which contestants used to create their own short stories. This greatly increased the reach of the campaign and turned up the chance of winning.

description.paragraph: The results surprised literally everyone! On World Donut Day alone, i.e. on the first day of the competition, there were over 100,000 visits to the creator's website! The GENZIE donut became the top SKU during the activation period and the brand's shoutboxes were clogged on all profiles!

DOOTI DONUTS‚Äô Facebook post had over 5,300 reactions and 56,000 contest entries! Almost 130,000 sweet donuts were created in the creator, the average user spent 1.5 minutes playing, and the number of events reached 2.3 million interactions within 2 weeks.

quote.text: Can you imagine that the weight of generated files was almost 22 Gigabytes! It's hard to believe, it's almost like the GTA trilogy on Nintendo Switch! We knew that our creator would go off, so I'm even more happy that it was used for such an amazing activation!

author.name: Piotr
author.role: Responsible for the software of the main mechanism and artistic direction

description.paragraph: But that's not even the most important part - our creator wasn't just sweet fun. It was a tool that gave real possibilities! DOOTI DONUTS replicated 8 winning donuts, and GENZIE got to eat them in one of their YouTube episodes!

video.caption: GENZIE - NAJLEPSZE ZDJƒòCIA WYGRYWAJƒÑ!

description.paragraph: Our creator is not only a tool for playing online, it can also be used in real life! In addition to the virtual sphere, it also had its premiere at live events in the five largest Polish cities, where young people could compete for prizes.

How did it work? Participants approached the stand, scanned a special QR code, which then took them to the creator. There, on their smartphones, they could create original donuts and submit them under Facebook posts dedicated to individual cities.

quote.text: ‚ÄûProbably the most amazing experience in this activation was watching in real time so many people playing with our creator at the same moment!‚Äù

description.paragraph: The creator was also promoted on TikTok, i.e. in the center of our target group, which, as it turned out, was delighted with the fun and the opportunity to win great prizes. GENZIE‚Äôs
about the contest alone had almost 30,000 reactions, and 6.9 million views, and in the comments, the kids developed their stories about the donuts!
We‚Äôre glad that the competition was so well received and that it brought a lot of joy to this community! Creating such an advanced system was quite a challenge, but the end result was so worth it!
Facebook competition and everything that happened around the Donut Creator brought us great distinction. Namely, the MIXX Awards statuette!!

quote.text: The whole activation exceeded our wildest expectations! All of the activities we planned contributed to the huge success of the new GENZIE donut. This was definitely not the last activation with the creator that definitely proved its super-effectiveness. Many thanks to the Trzask team for creating such a tool!

items.title: Innovative product = innovative explainer
caption: #design #animation
How to show car seals so you can't take your eyes off them? Check out the SaarGummi Neo case study!

description.paragraph: , based in Germany, is part of the SaarGummi Group, which produces durable and high-performance rubber sealing for the automotive and construction industry.

SaarGummi Neo itself  is the innovation entity specialized in robotics, augmented reality, 3D printing, and innovation sealing concepts. And it was on car sealing that we were to focus, creating an explainer for the brand, which would clearly explain the operation and specifications of a brand new product concept.

video.caption: SaarGummi Neo / Promo video / Production: Trzask Studio

description.paragraph: The course of cooperation was clear to everyone - SaarGummi Neo provided us with the film's script, and we animated it. However, to really grasp the technicalities of the product, the brand armed us with a super-detailed brief and introduced us to the highly technical aspects of its product so that we could better understand the purpose of the animation.

text: Designing an explainer that will help the recipients understand the products and distinguish them before making a purchase decision.

quote.text: ‚ÄûIn order to do our job properly, we spend the biffer part of our time understanding the product we are supposed to show. This was also the case here, especially since none of us knew much about automotive sealing before starting our cooperation with the client. Now? We almost feel like experts!‚Äù

description.paragraph: We designed and made all 3D elements ourselves, which allowed us to have full control over the animation and its dynamics. Thanks to the use of mime hands, we presented various variants of gasket assembly in an extremely attractive way.

In addition, to make the video even more interesting and engaging, we implemented dynamic close-up animations for individual elements. And all this to the accompaniment of a non-invasive melody that perfectly emphasized the use of the film.

quote.text: ‚ÄûWe had a lot of fun working on this video! We learned a lot about this industry, and at the same time, we were able to prepare 3D mock-ups, which were the star of this explainer! ‚Äù

description.paragraph: This is how a three-minute, professional explainer was created that explained all the technicalities and intricacies of the product comprehensively and, above all, understandably.

quote.text: Working with a foreign client on such a detailed and technological project was certainly a challenge that we took head-on, and we are very proud of how it turned out!

We enjoyed very much to work with Trzask! Studio on this product innovation video. Especially when the concept not only influences your own production process, but also that of the vehicle manufacturer, such animated concept videos are clearly superior to mere standard presentations. The complexity in this case was quite huge, but the team of Trzask! Studio as well as my team put a lot of efforts into this project to come up with an extremely well designed and illustrative video.

items.title: Traditional architecture in a futuristic style
caption: #design #animation
How to create a new animation from something we already know? Check out the TEDx Poland case study and see how we refreshed Warsaw's architecture!

description.paragraph: Contrary to what you may think, reflecting a given city's spirit with respect and, at the same time, with a creative twist is not an easy task.
Wanting to show the characteristic elements of the place but not copying them one by one can be a challenge. Fortunately, there are a lot of creative heads in our Trzask Studio!
So read on and see how we captured the spirit of Warsaw in a timeless project prepared for

video.caption: TEDx In a Heartbeat / Promo video / Production: Trzask Studio (Sfx, sound, animation) / 2016

description.paragraph: TED is a brand that needs no introduction. They conquered the world with a bang, making scientific conferences that are interesting and accessible to everyone. They hold their events in many countries, including Poland.
And so we had the opportunity to cooperate in creating animations for one of the conferences that took place at the
in Warsaw.

text: Render the beating heart of the Warsaw spirit in the animation promoting the TEDx Poland event.

quote.text: ‚ÄûExcitement is an understatement of what we felt when we discovered that we would be creating a special animation for one of the TEDx Poland events. We knew it had to be something special!‚Äù

author.name: Piotr
author.role: Responsible for creative ideas and project implementation

description.paragraph: Together with TEDx Poland, we wrote the animation script, which was to be the main theme shown during the Warsaw conference. We wanted the animation to focus attention without being overwhelming with details. We focused on the pulse and heartbeat theme and the color red representing TEDx.

quote.text: ‚ÄûWe wanted the artwork to have its own character, so we chose a linear style we should use in this animation. This style captures TEDx perfectly, and making everything in red enhances it even more! ‚Äù

description.paragraph: The animation was supposed to present characteristic Warsaw monuments and buildings, such as the Mermaid Vistula River monument. Everything was animated in a timeless linear form combined with neon elements that added a futuristic effect to the animation.
And in order to make an even more powerful impact, we added uplifting music that perfectly balanced the smooth animation.

quote.text: ‚ÄûWarsaw is one of those cities that literally pulse with life. That's why, as the main theme, we chose the heartbeat, which is super-connected with not only the linear style but also the city's colors and spirit.‚Äù

author.name: Piotr
author.role: Responsible for creative ideas and project implementation

description.paragraph: When creating an animation, we can be inspired by anything. What makes it unique is the way we combine the elements. The creative combination of traditional architecture with futuristic graphics made the animation for TEDx Poland so much more special in our eyes.

quote.text: Working closely with TEDx Poland, we had the opportunity to design something truly extraordinary. We're glad that we could create an absolutely timeless animation that shows the spirit of both the brand and the place where the conference took place!

items.title: Futuristic rich media
caption: #design #animation #richmedia
What will rich media look like in the future? Read the BMW case study and see a glimpse of what awaits us.

description.paragraph: How much information can you put in one small banner? It turns out that more than you think. In Trzask! Studio, we are looking into the future, and we believe that rich media is much more than simple mechanics.

We already created banners in the form of games, surveys, crazy animations. Now it's time to create a literal landing page that fits in a tiny ad. How did we do it? Read on and see what we have designed together with the
agency for one of the most famous car brands in the world - BMW!
2 mln PV,  3,55% CTR

video.caption: BMW - Richmedia video / Production: Trzask Studio 2022

description.paragraph: Premium brand = premium solutions. In order to reflect the luxury of BMW and properly celebrate brand's 50th anniversary, we knew that our ads must be luxurious, packed to the brim with engaging mechanisms and technologies that will delight and, at the same time, be intuitive to use.

text: To create engaging rich media for BMW 50th anniversary occasion and to promote the new BMW X1.

video.caption: BMW - For the past 50 years. One team. One Passion. / Production: BMW

quote.text: ‚ÄûWe wanted to properly celebrate the 50th anniversary of BMW. So for such a big event, we created not one but two POWERFUL ads with a dedicated, futuristic mechanism. The first focused on this event, while the second was to promote the BMW X1 model.‚Äù

description.paragraph: To give the ads a premium feeling, we've developed a dedicated mechanism for

. On the basis of the BMW landing page presenting the products, we analyzed the information structure, searched for the best points of the offer and highlighted them by creating short looped videos, from which the basis of our banners was formed.

In this we included options that allow users to freely move around the ad. With one click, they could see hidden photos and additional content. This button allowed the recipient to learn about benefits of the product even before they went to the brand's website!

quote.text: ‚ÄûWhat's the best thing about this mechanism? It's super smartphone friendly. We divided videos into sections, thanks to which we kept them light. As a result, the ad was loading smoothly, and it was much more interesting than standard static photos! ‚Äù

description.paragraph: When talking about a premium brand, one cannot fail to mention the quality of the materials themselves. When designing the ads, we focused on high-quality video fragments and capturing the dynamics of the vehicles themselves, which are so important for this category of brands.

Therefore, in order to best reflect key elements, we cut out dynamic and engaging shots from the TV commercial. In addition, we looped them so that the user has time to click and see the hidden information about the brand.

quote.text: ‚ÄûOur job is not only throwing in videos, but above all, their accurate recognition, framing, looping, dynamic montages and everything that will emphasize the advantages of the product if we want the person watching the ad to really feel the BMW mood.‚Äù

description.paragraph: This is how two dynamic banners were created, built like a mini landing page, which allowed the audience to immerse themselves in the mechanical world of BMW.
A small number of materials is enough to create super interactive solutions from the future that present the product and are mobile-friendly at the same time!

Having a lot of freedom both in the phase of developing a creative concept and in choosing materials, we were able to easily create rich media that matched the brand's premium value. And successful projects bloom with more!

quote.text: ‚ÄûThanks to the great openness and trust from the client, we created an animation style that we adapt to subsequent ads of this brand. It can be really extensive and act as a landing page in an accessible form. ‚Äù

author.name: Piotr
author.role: Responsible for creative ideas and project implementation

items.title: How to bring promo of your game to a higher LVL!
caption: #banners #animation #richmedia #games
What is the most important thing when creating promotional materials for a game? Check out the Dying Light 2 case study!

description.paragraph: When creating promotional materials for a game, it often happens that just one particular piece of gameplay, screenshot or scene can turn your promotional game 180 degrees and take it to the next level. This was the case with video and HTML5 ads we created for Techland‚Äôs
promo of the second part of their epic game - Dying Light.

video.caption: Dying Light 2 - Richmedia ads / Production: Trzask Studio (vfx, sound, animation, 3D, HTML5), Techland (gameplay movie, art direction) 2023

description.paragraph: If you want to go to a higher level of
promotion, knowing the gameplay and publisher's materials is an absolute must-have. Because to make a good advertisement, you have to really feel the promoted product.
We did exactly this with projects prepared for Techland, with whom we‚Äôre collaborating on their latest title, Dying Light 2.

text: Design banners that will draw the audience into the world of Dying Light 2 and encourage them to play.

video.caption: Main trailer of new DLC - Dying Light 2 Stay Human: Bloody Ties Announcement Trailer 2023

quote.text: ‚ÄúWith Techland, and their game Dying Light 2 in particular, we know exactly what we can afford when designing promotional materials. We know publisher's resources, we know what videos they use, what the gameplay looks like and how the narrative is built. Knowing this allows us to approach the subject with great precision.‚Äù

author.name: Piotr
author.role: Responsible for creative ideas and project implementation

description.paragraph: At Trzask Studio, there is no such thing as 'half-measures'. Therefore, having a clearly defined goal, we were able to start creative work process.
We spent hours watching gameplay after gameplay in slow motion, looking for perfect frames and shots.
We analyzed dozens of key arts, production materials, and player screenshots.
All this in order to find those few ideal frames that will captivate the audience. Conclusion? It was worth it!

quote.text: ‚ÄûHaving a free hand in the choice of materials and a clear vision of how we want the banners to look, we were able to create amazing spatial effects that delighted the audience!‚Äù

description.paragraph: This is how we created the first series of ads for the discount sales campaign.
Trzask-style, instead of usual static ads, we‚Äôve built a series of strong, multi-dimensional banners with scenes from the

Animated smoke effects, flickering lights, character and environment movement were enclosed in tiny banners, weighing only 150 KB. Seems impossible? But we did it! All these procedures brought the static shots to life and made all creatives absolutely magical.

quote.text: ‚ÄúWe were supposed to do one line, and ended up with three variants that got the green light right away. The joy of the team at the work well done and the big surprise of our partner that something like this could be done was priceless!‚Äù

author.name: Piotr
author.role: Responsible for creative ideas and project implementation

description.paragraph: The second campaign that will stay in our hearts for a long time is the new
promo. It was a strong update to the game, giving the opportunity to fight in a new arena.

After seeing the trailer, we decided to revive the main key visual promoting the add-on and play with the depth of the photo. This is how we created an image format in which we put the best moment of the game. Here, too, the challenge was to maintain the weight of 150 KB.
The character‚Äôs animation performed a similar weapon attack move as in the gameplay, and this combined with the play of lights brought to life the amazing campaign key visual.
But it's not over yet! To surprise the viewer even more, Techland decided to use richmedia on one of the most popular gaming websites, IGN!
Richmedia gave us a mechanism of surprise in a form of fake news content. This is a strong accent for the strong gameplay that the DLC provides us with, which we are very proud of!

quote.text: ‚ÄûWe figured out that the character who was hiding under the website just before being knocked down, smashes fake ads on the website with a stick. On purpose, the stick almost hits the user's screen, pops up and puts us in an awkward position, and thus, strongly intrigues the recipient.‚Äù

description.paragraph: Ultimately, there were some really powerful creatives for Dying Light 2 that we're incredibly proud of. But more importantly, the gaming community enjoyed them, and that's what we always care about the most!

quote.text: ‚ÄûPiotr's team did an incredible job, they surprised us with these animations, it was amazing that they managed to enclose it in such small banner forms. Their work allowed us to strengthen marketing activities not only in the field of video materials, but also in the field of display campaigns.‚Äù

items.title: Aesthetics are the key of marketing. How to create video ads from static graphics
caption: #design #animation
Creating an eye-catching video using only product photos is not that difficult. You don‚Äôt believe it? Read the Health Labs Care case study!

description.paragraph: We don't need much to create a good ad that would really speak to the audience. Good-quality, aesthetic photos are often enough to give them a second life by adding a few eye-catching, moving parts and a bit of a Trzask‚Äôs ingredient to create a video that no brand will be ashamed of.
That‚Äôs what we did with Health Labs Care assets when designing a dedicated series of ads. Read on and see what magic tricks we used!

video.caption: Health Labs Care - Youtube ads / Production: Trzask Studio (vfx, sound, animation), Health Labs Care (photo session, art direction) 2021/2022

description.paragraph: is known for helping people stay healthy, both looking and feeling well. They create products for everyday health and beauty care. Their photos are full of delicate aesthetics that catch the eye and make them unforgettable. That's why, when we started working on videos promoting the brand's special offers, we knew we had to match this elegance!

text: Give photos of Health Labs products a second life and make the audience fall in love with the ads‚Äô aesthetics!

quote.text: ‚ÄûWe‚Äôve known each other with Health Labs Care for a long time, and our collaboration consists primarily of creating aesthetic bumpers and short videos. Producing them gives us a lot of joy, but also a fascinating peace of mind. This is how these photos affect us!‚Äù

description.paragraph: One of the first projects we worked on with Health Labs Care was a

We wanted to emphasize the contrast between the dark background, resembling the night sky, and bright elements, so we used neon effects that put the whole image in motion. In post-production, we also added flashing stars, close-ups of the product, and large animated texts.

quote.text: ‚ÄûWe named it neon bumper because in the close-up scenes of the product we wanted to add depth to the whole image. The nocturnal aesthetics were perfect for adding flavor in the form of neon flashes in the video‚Äôs background! My favourite here is definitely the last scene with sparkling neon glass showing the product‚Äôs reflection, poetry!‚Äù

description.paragraph: Another project we are very proud of was dedicated bumpers promoting supplements for the youngest. They consisted of two parts - in the beginning, there was a short family scene that influenced positive emotions, and then an animated board presenting products from the MyKids series.

Here, we used a popular theme from cartoons of plasticine shapes reminiscing wooden blocks, evoking childhood memories. The sun, raindrops, and blocks, set in motion, enlivened the image, giving the ad coherence and balance.

video.caption: Health Labs Care - My Kids / Production: Trzask Studio (vfx, sound, animation), Health Labs Care (photo session, art direction) 2022

quote.text: ‚ÄûCreating these ads made us go back to our childhood for a moment when all that mattered were wooden blocks and Teddy Bear Uszatek. We had a lot of fun animating plasticine elements!‚Äù

description.paragraph: There is something magical about budding flowers that is associated with vitality. That‚Äôs why we decided to give this theme to the ad promoting a special discount on all products for

To emphasise this, we made close-ups of individual products with blooming flowers all around. And to give the animation dynamics, zoomed the frame out after a while and reduced it by adding a white frame. Thanks to this, we also managed to emphasise the message with a discount even better, its outline slightly protruding beyond the picture‚Äôs frame.

quote.text: ‚ÄûBlooming flowers are not only pretty but also have their own meaning. This theme was a perfect fit for Health Labs‚Äô birthday not only referring to the flourishing but also due to its delicate aesthetics.‚Äù

description.paragraph: Recently, we also had the opportunity to go back to our roots and create another
promo video for Health Labs Care. This time, however, we decided to focus on diamond aesthetics, which is also strongly associated with a starry sky.

The video started with a bang, with a large diamond text, 'Black Friday', twinkling like stars at night. Additionally, to liven up the image, we added an animation of diamond dust fluttering around the product, shining against the night sky. This time, we also added a lector who strengthened the message of the ad.

quote.text: ‚ÄûWe created this ad literally in the spirit of the song's lyrics: ‚Äúshine bright like a diamond‚Äù. Flashing, eye-catching texts, diamond dust and that shine on the product packaging. Now, every time I hear a Diamonds song, I see this ad in my mind's eye!‚Äù

description.paragraph: Working with the Health Labs team gives us a lot of energy to create the impossible. Designing these types of ads is an inspiring experience that allows us to use different aesthetic styles and give brand photos a second life. And we are all the more pleased that these ads really work and everyone is happy with the end result!

video.caption: Health Labs Care - ShapeMe / Production: Trzask Studio (vfx, sound, animation), Health Labs Care (photo session, art direction), MadBear(video production) 2022

quote.text: ‚ÄûAt Health Labs Care, we want the ads we create to reflect the brand's mission of caring for the health, beauty and well-being of our customers. With these videos, Studio Trzask showed how well they understood our message, which was appreciated not only by us, but also by our clients.‚Äù

items.title: Donut Pack and gamification on the brand's website. A new way of marketing
caption: #design #animation #games
Sweet interactions in a house full of donuts? This is how a new era of marketing is born! Check out Dooti Donuts case study and see how we created an engaging brand website.

description.paragraph: Involving young people in the brand‚Äôs world is not the easiest task. Especially when we want to refresh the brand website that young people rarely visit.
In our opinion, the product page should be brand‚Äôs showpiece. A place where the audience will be able to immerse themselves in the brand universe and learn its story.
So how to make brand communication engaging and encourage young people to get to know it? We invite you to the Dooti Donuts case study, in which we will show you our way to sweet success!

video.caption: Dooti Donuts - Dom donut√≥w / Production: Trzask Studio (art direction, vfx, sound, animation, 3d modeling) 2021

description.paragraph: Dooti Donuts is known for producing delicious donuts, each with its own unique personality. The brand emphasises it in every communication through various activations, such as the Dooti Donuts Creator, in which‚Äôs production we participated. This time we were to refresh
Our task was to create a place where young people could meet Dooti Donuts and spend their time there willingly.

text: Create an interactive website that will encourage young people to get to know Dooti Donuts and enter the brand‚Äôs world.

quote.text: ‚ÄûWe have known each other with Dooti Donuts for a good few years and we had some great, successful projects behind us. That‚Äôs why we were all the more pleased with their trust when the brand entrusted us with the preparation of a product page - the heart of Dooti Donuts!‚Äù

author.name: Piotr
author.role: Responsible for the main mechanism, artistic supervision and project coordination

description.paragraph: During the concept work, we primarily thought about how to show donuts and their world to our audience. That's why we asked ourselves some basic questions. What is important to young people? How do they spend their free time? What can engage them?

In search of inspiration, we assumed that for teenagers, the most important thing is their close environment - their friends and playing games together. They don't watch traditional media, but social media -
- are especially close to them.

quote.text: ‚ÄûEkipa is at the moment the most popular group of influencers in Poland. They started the trend of creating channels where friends live together in a house, spend time together, have fun and show everyday life. And what else are Dooti Donuts if not an Ekipa of donuts? The combination was perfect!‚Äù

description.paragraph: This is how an interactive website was created, which received the honorable name of Donut Pack (pl: Paczka Donut√≥w)! The website was constructed like a donut box, in which the recipient could move between rooms, learning about the interests and lifestyle of individual donuts. We designed all of this using 3D technology, paying special attention to individual elements in the rooms that reflect donuts‚Äô nature.

In a traditional Trzask way, we implemented a lot of hotspots in the website, thanks to which teenagers could look into donut cabinets, listen to music together or talk to the household members. There is even a gallery in the donut house called the Chill Room where you can get to know all the donuts of the pack!

video.caption: Dom donut√≥w - Summary of interaction / Production: Trzask Studio (art direction, vfx, sound, animation, 3d modeling) 2021

quote.text: ‚ÄûThe main method of communication among teens are chats, so we decided that this is how donuts will talk to them on the website. In the page‚Äôs corner, chat boxes, with what the donuts have to say, appear every now and then. But that's not the best part! Users can answer them!‚Äù

description.paragraph: Christmas was fast approaching when we were creating the Donut Package. So we decided to organise a special, limited story mission, in which people entering the website were to help donuts find Santa's hat, which was lost somewhere during his last visit.

This gamification allowed recipients to go through the entire page while engaging them without forcing them to interact. The participants of the game could familiarise themselves with the website by performing tasks in individual rooms. An additional element of the gamification was Dooti Donuts Facebook competition, in which participants were to answer a question of where was the Santa‚Äôs hat in the donut house and why it was there in the first place.

video.caption: Dom donut√≥w - Donut scavenger hunt / Production: Trzask Studio (art direction, vfx, sound, animation, 3d modeling) 2021

quote.text: ‚ÄûIn each room, game participants received a different task from the donuts - they solved puzzles left by Santa‚Äôs helpers, looked for clues by clicking on objects, talked to Santa on the phone and deciphered riddles. It was awesome!‚Äù

description.paragraph: The production may have been complicated and we faced many challenges, but it also gave us twice as much fun when we were creating the world of donuts! We believe that we have managed to create a place where young people can come back and feel at home. Anyway,

quote.text: ‚ÄûWorking with Trzask studio always brings us a lot of joy and inspiration. They are not only a team that does solid work, but most of all people full of creative energy who understand our brand like no one else!‚Äù

items.title: Animations sweet like honey with a Trzask twist
caption: #design #animation
How to create animations that can be used in an ongoing communication? Click and see our case study about collaboration with Pasieki Rodzinski Family!

description.paragraph: Creating original animations can be time-consuming. You need a good idea, a design, and an entire post-production process that sets graphics in motion. However, there is a way to reuse animations that will be different each time. And we know it! Want to know our sweet secret? Read on!

video.caption: Pasieki Rodziny Sadowskich - Social media ads / Production: Trzask Studio (sound, animation), Pasieki (illustrations) 2021/2022

description.paragraph: is currently one of the largest beekeeping farms in Poland, with over 3,000 hives creating honey, oils, cosmetics and many other wonders in cooperation with bees.

text: To create sweet materials for the brand's social media that will can be used many times!

quote.text: ‚ÄûIt just so happened that when we approached the brand to buy honey for Christmas presents, they needed help with creating social media content. And this is how our partnership cooperation was born.‚Äù

description.paragraph: We wanted to reflect brand's sweet spirit through our animations, so we decided to use
that are on the packaging of the brand's products. Through the videos, we were able to give them personality and emphasize the values ‚Äã‚Äãof the Pasieki Rodziny Sadowskich.

In this form, we have designed two types of animations - those that can be used in everyday brand communication and those dedicated to special occasions. The latter consisted of several 15-second animations perfectly matching social media formats. Among them there is a video for
and a video promoting a raspberry honey - Miodzi≈õ.

quote.text: ‚ÄûOne of my favourite animations is the one we made for Grandma's Day. It's so sweet, with a lovely message, a matching melody and pastel colors. You can watch it for hours!‚Äù

description.paragraph: In addition to short, dedicated videos, we have also created an animation package that fits perfectly into the InstaStory and Facebook formats. On a pastel background, we animated flying bees
leaving space for text, thanks to which Pasieki Rodziny Sadowskich can use them repeatedly when creating their content.
Additionally, each video tells its own story

description.text: to the accompaniment of a sweet song.

description.paragraph: Like, for example, a ladybug chasing bees across the screen!

quote.text: ‚ÄûAn additional tasteful detail of our videos is specifically selected music, which emphasizes the sweetness of the brand and animation. This song is playing in my head on repeat!‚Äù

description.paragraph: We are so proud that we can create animations for Pasieki Rodziny Sadowskich that reflect brand‚Äôs spirit and are sweet like the honey they produce. Having a free hand in working on materials, we can let our imagination run wild and show our creativity, which we always enjoy, especially when we know that what we produced will also bring joy to the brand!

quote.text: ‚ÄûHaving animations that we can freely and repeatedly use in our social media definitely saves time. Working with Trzask studio is pure pleasure. We can't wait to see what else they show us!‚Äù

items.title: How to engage teens and start brand‚Äôs TikTok with a blast
caption: #design #animation
How to make an effective entrance on TikTok? Click and check Dooti Donuts case study to find out how, together with the brand, we engaged thousands of young people!

description.paragraph: For several years now, TikTok has reigned supreme among social media as a place where young people can express themselves through short videos. Brands are also beginning to appreciate this platform and are more and more willing to create their fanpages to reach this hard-to-reach target group that is superior at avoiding ads.

But to really get to them, it's not enough to create an account and upload just anything. To really make an effective entrance, you need an original idea that fits in with the rapidly changing TikTok trends. For example, such as Dooti Donuts did, in which Trzask proudly helped!

video.caption: Dooti Donuts - Social media ads / Production: Trzask Studio (art direction, vfx, sound, animation, 3d modeling) 2021/2022

description.paragraph: TikTok is a medium that has fascinated us for a long time - young people can show their creative spirit there. When we got a brief from Dooti Donuts to create dedicated animations on the brand's TikTok, we assumed that teens‚Äô world currently revolves around challenges and trends. They are everywhere - in games, TV series, music, social media. This is their way of communicating and expressing themselves. Showing that they are good at something or presenting their talents.
To properly say hello to TikTok users, we've created an

description.text: animation of the brand‚Äôs three main donuts

description.paragraph: performing a crazy dance to a lively song. For this we used Adobe After Effects‚Äô capabilities, which gave us many opportunities to play with characters and their movements.

quote.text: ‚ÄûNew challenges and trends appear every day on TikTok, which many young people follow. We wanted to show them that Dooti Donuts belongs to their world and understands their language.‚Äù

description.paragraph: One of the videos we are most proud of is the one we created to promote the new Ekipa‚Äôs Donut. To reflect the atmosphere of Friz and his team, and to effectively present the new member of the Dooti Donuts‚Äô pack, we came up with a short story full of flashes and flying sprinkles.

stands in a dark room, surrounded by smoke, which gives the scene mysterious vibes. Suddenly the room brightens, smoke clears, revealing the hero of the story. Ekipa‚Äôs Donut is standing on the table in the spotlight, confetti and emotes fly around him, as befits a real celebrity. He waves to his pack mates, happily tapping his foot to the catchy melody.

quote.text: ‚ÄûWe wanted the Ekipa‚Äôs Donut to be the cool homie he really is. We imagined that everyone in the donut pack was crazy about him. After all, he's a celebrity!‚Äù

description.paragraph: only comes into action once a year, then he disappears and no one knows where he‚Äôs hiding. That‚Äôs why his returns must always cause as much excitement as possible. This time it was similar when we created a short animation in a truly Halloween style!
The story we wanted to tell here is of Donut named Stripe getting lost in the cemetery one night in October. In search of a way back to his pack, Stripe finds a new buddy, the Halloween Donut!

quote.text: ‚ÄûTo create the animation, we used 3D mockups of donuts, thanks to which they could rotate and wave their arms.‚Äù

description.paragraph: We are very proud that we can participate in this project, and the joy is even sweeter when we know that the recipients liked our videos as much as we did! The animations collected a total of almost 14 million views, making a sensation in the TikTok world!
Huge congratulations to Dooti Donuts for a truly spectacular entrance and for creating a new hit donut! After Ekipa‚Äôs ice cream, it's time for the

quote.text: ‚ÄûThe support from the Trzask team is invaluable. We can always count on their creativity and understanding of the teenagers‚Äô world, which leads to crazy ideas that we are very pleased with!‚Äù

items.title: Stories with a thrill, or how to make recipients get into the plot of the game
caption: #animation
You can add an intriguing story to everything. Click, check out JARS case study and see it for yourself!

description.paragraph: Games are an unwavering part of our lives - they distract us from reality, allow us to spend time with friends, teach us, tell stories. The plot is one of the most addictive and necessary elements of any gameplay. Regardless of whether it is a MMORPG, FPS or strategy game. For each type of game, you can add an intriguing story that will absorb players endlessly. And exactly this kind of storyline was created by Mousetrap Games studio for their latest game JARS, for which we had the pleasure to create animations telling the protagonist‚Äôs story.

video.caption: Jars - Game / Production: Trzask Studio (vfx, sound, animation), Story/Illustration: MouseTrap Games 2021

description.paragraph: JARS is a strategy game with puzzles and tower defence elements, which had its premiere on Nintendo Switch on 20.10.2021. Together with the main character - Victor - players venture into a partly scary and partly charming world of secrets hidden in the family house‚Äôs basement. The game has a unique atmosphere with raw graphics that will remind many people of the peculiar style of Tim Burton.
We were to animate cinematics in the exact same aesthetic, which would introduce the audience to the game‚Äôs mood and make them fall in love with it.

text: make recipients feel the dark atmosphere of the game and fall in love with its plot.

video.caption: Jars - Game / Production: Trzask Studio (vfx, sound, animation), Story/Illustration: MouseTrap Games 2021

quote.text: ‚ÄûAfter a successful joint project on trailer animations for Run The Beat, Mousetrap Games decided to trust us even more and gave us a big project in which we were to make a series of videos that developed JARS‚Äô story. Excitement is not enough of a word to describe how excited we were about this opportunity! We started working on it immediately!‚Äù

description.paragraph: We had to create ten scenes, each lasting for 15-30 seconds. All of them combined into a story about Victor and his adventures. Each scene was broken down into prime factors and, in a typical Trzask style, we tweaked all, even the smallest details, to the last button. Close collaboration with Mousetrap Games was very helpful throughout the whole project - especially from the author of these wonderful, disturbing illustrations, who helped us with some animations!

quote.text: ‚ÄûWe are always very happy to work closely with our clients. We take the topics straight to the workshop, discuss ideas on a daily basis and approve all project stages. Thanks to this, our work goes smoothly and there are no misunderstandings. And we are even more happy when we stay in the gaming atmosphere and create a shared space on Discord with a client, like it was in this project!‚Äù

description.paragraph: To best reflect the game‚Äôs climate, we animated characters in a time-lapse style, illuminated rooms, and brought spiders to life. With plenty of room for creativity, we were able to create a spooky vampire atmosphere.
An additional aspect that we are very proud of was a chilling soundtrack, which perfectly matched the presented scenes and gave them an even darker mood.

quote.text: ‚ÄûThe fridge scene is one of my favourites. We had a lot of fun with it and we could show off our skills - fun with lighting, specific sounds, vfx effects with smoke and my favourite thing - a spider entering the fridge - awesome!‚Äù

video.caption: Jars - Game / Production: Trzask Studio (vfx, sound, animation), Story/Illustration: MouseTrap Games 2021

description.paragraph: The end result surprised even us. Animations turned out exactly as we dreamed - they were grotesque and spooky, and the soundtrack built the tension typical for thrillers. And the more joy for us is the fact that we had a great time working on this project, feeling every scene we animated!

video.caption: Jars - Game / Production: Trzask Studio (vfx, sound, animation), Story/Illustration: MouseTrap Games 2021

quote.text: ‚ÄûFor me, the washing machine scene was a great example. Deepening the horror effect by moving the spotlight, sharpening frames on the hero as he peered into the washing machine drum, and those details! Blinking eyes of creatures hidden in shadows added even more to this scene. Total bull's eye for me was playing with music, which changed depending on the perspective!‚Äù

description.paragraph: You won't believe it, but we‚Äôre featured in the end credits of the game. We are very proud of the effect and are glad that we could be a part of this project. You can play the game on Steam and the Nintendo Switch console.

video.caption: Jars - Game / Production: Trzask Studio (vfx, sound, animation), Story/Illustration: MouseTrap Games 2021

quote.text: ‚ÄûTrzask perfectly reflected JARS‚Äô atmosphere by depicting the horror-humorous nature of the game. These animations made Victor's story come to life, and everything looked like a super-quality thrill cartoon!‚Äù

items.title: How to encourage young people to plunge into brand‚Äôs world and take part in the lottery
caption: #design #animation #tvc
Check out the Tofflairs case study and find out how we did it!

description.paragraph: To reach your message, the ad should be properly tailored to your target group, whether it be on TV or Internet. And when our audience are young people who oftenly are not encouraged by the standard advertising, it is even more important. So how to engage them enough to become interested in the brand‚Äôs world and take part in activities? Read Tofflairs case study and discover how we did it!

video.caption: Tofflairs - Przyklejaj Nagrody / Production: Trzask Studio (design, animation) 2021 (Final spot, game platform scene)

description.paragraph: The iconic Wawel brand, Tofflairs, is the perfect companion for any occasion. To find caramel sweets lovers, they organised a lottery with super-simple mechanics with gaming gear and cash as prizes.

In the course of an intense search for the perfect insight to create a lottery‚Äôs video ad, we noticed that technology is a huge part of young people's lives. Gaming, streaming, social media - it all adds up to their everyday life. It is not only a great way of spending their free time, but also keeping in touch with their friends. It‚Äôs a part of their culture.

text: create a 15-second ad set in the young people‚Äôs world that truly SPEAKS to them.

video.caption: Tofflairs - Przyklejaj Nagrody / Production: Trzask Studio (design, animation) 2021 (Final spot, scene with product)

quote.text: ‚ÄûWe believe that the message gets even better when it speaks our audience‚Äôs language. That‚Äôs why we wanted to make an advertisement based on gaming insight, in which we would include elements from various popular games.‚Äù

description.paragraph: What Tofflairs and games have in common? While thinking about creative ideas, we noticed that what both of these things have in common is that they are moments of detachment from reality. That is why we decided to create an engaging video telling the hero's story as if they were in platform games.

quote.text: ‚ÄûWe saw through the eyes of our imaginations a colourful, vivid animation, starting with a character selection that is typical in almost all games. We even made up some cool names for them! The boy was called Kop3r3k and the girl‚Äôs name was Lagun-A!‚Äù

video.caption: Tofflairs - Przyklejaj Nagrody / Production: Trzask Studio (design, animation) 2021 (Final spot, start scene, we run the ad like a game!)

description.paragraph: We arranged the entire ad to look like a round of a platform game mirroring lottery in real life. Character chosen at the beginning started their journey by running through the caramel town to the store in order to buy a pack of Tofflairs and take part in the lottery.

quote.text: ‚ÄûWe focused on presenting two pieces of information that are the most important from the perspective of our recipients: lottery mechanics and prizes. And thanks to putting the message in the gaming world, we managed to raise a positive sentiment in them.‚Äù

description.paragraph: In the end, we created a 15-second ad, which not only impressed our target audience, but also encouraged them to take part in the lottery by showing them how sweet their victory can be.

Of course, we wouldn't be ourselves if we hadn't added a special Trzask twist to it. This time it was an animation, which, unlike standard pixelated platform games, had a soft finish, referring to brand's communication and dragging caramels. An additional flavour for gaming fans was the character interface, where the tiles at the bottom of the screen showed what our hero gained during the game!

video.caption: Tofflairs - Przyklejaj Nagrody / Production: Trzask Studio (design, animation) 2021 (Final spot, full animation 15s)

quote.text: ‚ÄûThe end result of the advertisement was satisfactory. Skillful matching of our materials to the gaming world made it possible to create a video that was both original and consistent with our standard communication.‚Äù

items.title: Gaming goes with everything. You don‚Äôt believe it? Then read
caption: #design #animation #instreamads
With the right attitude, we can combine almost everything. See the Blik case study and learn how to connect gaming with a payment system!

description.paragraph: Inspiration and insight are essential, the rest will follow. With the right attitude, we can combine almost everything, for example, gaming with... a payment system in times of a pandemic.

video.caption: Blik - Instream ad / Concept: Instreamly / Production: Trzask Studio (design, animation) 2020

description.paragraph: We received a brief from our partner, inSTREAMLY, to design artworks for the Blik campaign. We got scenarios with an insight that Blik accompanies people in the game called life.

There were three animations to create, and each of them was supposed to resemble inventory from various games that are popular on streaming platforms - League of Legends, Fortnite and Valorant. It‚Äôs a repeated theme in many games and it‚Äôs a place where we can store purchased items.

text: match artworks with the games they were to appear on. The closer to the original, the better!

video.caption: Blik - Instream ad / Concept: Instreamly / Production: Trzask Studio (design, animation) 2020

quote.text: ‚ÄûHaving a specific brief together with the concept and script, we are able to focus on what is most important - how to reflect everything in the animation and create even more fantastic assets.‚Äù

description.paragraph: The only material we got was a logo and a brandbook. At first glance, it seems to be far less than enough. But sometimes it's better to get less! We have almost no limitations on the creation process, we have almost free hand and full control over the resulting assets, and that was exactly what happened in this case.

quote.text: ‚ÄûThe project required a bit of research, we watched streams and videos from these three games, we looked through various websites for relevant references. And finally, we managed to choose specific elements that allowed us to start the next, super-exciting stage, which is creative work!‚Äù

description.paragraph: We designed the artworks for inSTREAMLY to make them look like they were literally taken from games they were going to be displayed on. It was also a project that made us masters of smoke animation, which when created for League of Legends, looked almost real! As we say it, it is the so-called 'Trzask-effect' ;) üòâ

quote.text: ‚ÄûWith a lot of creative space, we could afford to create animations that literally fit into the games they were displayed on. We had a lot of fun searching for items that matched each title!‚Äù

description.paragraph: All animations started with a similar theme of 'recall'', which was intended to strongly attract viewers‚Äô attention and introduce them to the rest of the story. Then the artworks went to inventory, where instead of game items, were everyday utensils, such as a bottle of water, toilet paper, or... a bathing duck. What? It‚Äôs a much-needed thing!

video.caption: Blik - Instream ad / Concept: Instreamly / Production: Trzask Studio (design, animation) 2020

quote.text: ‚ÄûWe don't want to brag but the outcome was SUPERB! The artworks turned out exactly as we dreamed of, and this experience taught us that sometimes less material means more in terms of imagination. Sky is the limit guys!‚Äù

items.title: Christmas sentiments, or how to make your recipients smile
caption: #design #animation #richmedia
We invite you to the Christmas table. Check Lubella case study and find out how our recipients fell in love with our advertisements!

description.paragraph: Each family member has their flagship quotes. We are able to recite some of them from memory. However, despite the fact that we hear them on every occasion, they make us smile because these are the moments that we associate with warmth and joy. This insight followed us when we prepared a creative concept for the Lubella Christmas Rich media campaign, warming our hearts during the winter season.

video.caption: Lubella - ≈öwiƒôta / Production: Trzask Studio (design, animation, programming) 2020

description.paragraph: The main goal that we set ourselves when creating a Christmas rich media ad for Lubella was to make the recipients smile. We wanted them to feel like they were at a real Christmas table. And what is the best thing that awakens such emotions? Typical texts that we know by heart and hear every year. Our main asset was the TV spot we got from the client. It was supposed to be the binder of all the brand's activities during the Christmas campaign.

video.caption: Lubella - Rozgadanych ≈öwiƒÖt (TV Advert), Production House: Maspex

quote.text: ‚ÄûThis ad is based on the belief that the texts we all hear at the Christmas table are a permanent part of the holidays, just like a Christmas tree or the 12 dishes. Perhaps it is worth cultivating them by preparing answers to the questions of our grandmothers and uncles beforehand‚Äù

description.paragraph: For this campaign, we really wanted to make it consistent with other media and main communication of the brand, which is why we used the appropriate fragments of the spot to create the banner.

quote.text: ‚ÄûThe Christmas communication of Lubella is very warm and family friendly. We wanted to keep it in our ad, adding our own twist to it, which we managed to reflect through appropriately selected copy.‚Äù

author.name: Weronika Bielecka
author.role: She makes sure that everything is in right place

description.paragraph: We created an interactive banner that has been designed so that the recipient can choose one of the four texts most often heard by them during holidays. They had a choice of texts such as:
- In my times‚Ä¶
- And that's how it is‚Ä¶
- Excuse me, are you gonna eat this?
- More preparations than the holidays

quote.text: ‚ÄûFrom the Lubella spot, we took individual family members and assigned different lines to them. Grandfather, father, child and even a dog got their own text! After all, it is a full-fledged family member just as the others!‚Äù

sections.title: Every good story has a surprising twist

description.paragraph: After voting, another part of the ad appeared, showing the percentage of people voting on the same text among the users who have seen the banner. It was the first campaign we used this mechanism, giving people a sense of community and bringing a smile to their faces.

quote.text: ‚ÄûCompared to other digital creatives used in this campaign, the rich media ads prepared by Trzask Studio for Lubella were characterised by a much longer user contact time with the asset. So they gave the audience a great opportunity to feel the atmosphere of our Christmas spot.‚Äù

items.title: Dynamic texts, or interactive banner advertising
caption: #design #animation #richmedia
Do you think a TV spot is only suitable for television? Check Tymbark case study and find out how we create magic!

description.paragraph: Is it possible to give TV spots a second life and adapt them to other advertising formats, such as online banners? Of course! More importantly - you can make them something super innovative that will reach a wide variety of target groups. Sometimes all you need is a bit of imagination and a pinch of programming skill.

video.caption: Tymbark - Kapsle / Production: Trzask Studio (design, animation, programming) 2020

description.paragraph: Probably everyone knows Tymbark caps. At the moment, they are absolutely iconic. That is why they are a challenge to show in ads. Over the years, many different projects have been created with their participation, impressing everyone with their creativity. Therefore, when we received a brief to create innovative banners, we knew that we had to go BIG. For use in our creations, we received a TV ad from the client, fragments of which appeared in our banners, as an element connecting the entire campaign.

video.caption: Tymbark - A ty co masz pod kapslem? (TV Advert), Production House: BrainBox

quote.text: ‚ÄûWe always challenge the projects that come to us and each time we try to make them even more refined and bolder.‚Äù

description.paragraph: Giving second life to a TV spot is never easy. We imposed a demanding task on ourselves so that the brand could reach its recipients even more effectively. We focused on creating something completely new, which would allow us to speak directly to the very specific users who were currently visiting the site. And as a communication medium, we used‚Ä¶ of course, the iconic Tymbark caps.

quote.text: ‚ÄûThe tool that I programmed is fully flexible in terms of adapting to any video. Now every TV spot will get its second life, adapted to banner formats in a completely new interactive form, just like Netflix series.‚Äù

description.paragraph: As the basis of our ads, we chose two best-matching fragments of the Tymbark spot. Then we put dynamic text boxes inside, to trigger appropriate sequences for each target group exactly at the moment of showing what is on the inside side of the cap. And if that wasn't enough, we also added an interaction that could change the course of events of the target spot. And all of this was closed in banner with a limit of 150kb.

quote.text: ‚ÄûReplacing the content in the slogans was the key to reaching many target groups of this campaign. Thanks to that, we addressed specific people by referring to their gender, their interests or what the given users saw on the websites.‚Äù

author.name: Weronika Bielecka
author.role: She makes sure that everything is in right place

description.paragraph: At the end, we created two versions of the ad and dozens of scenarios of situations tailored to the user profiles that interested us. The texts on caps changed depending on the gender and interests of the recipients, or even on the content of websites on which banners appeared, which made the project surprise everyone with its innovation on a large scale!

quote.text: ‚ÄûWe are always happy when a client places so much trust in us. Putting your materials to the processing and believing that something really great will come out of it. That's what happened here and we are very proud of how the banners for Tymbark turned out!‚Äù

items.title: The golden mean between a TV ad and a banner
caption: #design #animation #richmedia
How to charm your recipients with super smooth ads? Check Przetworki case study and learn about our sweet secret!

description.paragraph: How would you show smoothness in your ad? This is the challenge for today and our main goal. Everything should be smooth, just like the jam for which we made these ads. And all of this was made so mothers who were our target group would fall in love with the product. Demanding task? We did it, and if you want to know our secret, read on and you will find out how the banners for the ≈Åowicz‚Äôs 'Przetworki' campaign were created!

video.caption: ≈Åowicz - Extra g≈Çadki / Production: Trzask Studio (concept, design, animation, programming) 2019

description.paragraph: The ≈Åowicz brand has found a simple solution for weary mothers - Przetworki is a jam ideal for serving young children due to their smooth consistency. The campaign itself consisted of two parts - the first was to engage the audience and encourage interaction with the brand, and the second was to have standard animated banners. To ensure the consistency of the entire campaign, all banners were created on the basis of the TV ad that we received in the materials from ≈Åowicz.

text: show smoothness! Smooth characters, smooth animations, everything super smooth - just like promoted jam.

video.caption: ≈Åowicz Extra G≈Çadki (TV Advert), Production House: Maspex, Agency: Brasil Warsaw

quote.text: ‚ÄûWe had some ideas even before we saw the client's spott. From the very beginning, our creative concepts included various ideas for squeezing strawberries so that we would get that super smoothness out of them.‚Äù

description.paragraph: Eventually, 3 initial concepts were created. The assumption of one of them was to react to the film displayed in the banner.

quote.text: ‚ÄûIn this version of the banner, we primarily wanted to show how Przetworki react to the video with themselves as the main cast. We had a lot of fun animating their emotions! At one point, the strawberry even lost all of its seeds! It took a long time to pick it up and animate the whole process, but this is what you do for the WOW effect!‚Äù

author.name: Weronika Bielecka
author.role: She makes sure that everything is in right place

description.paragraph: Przetworki were presented in a form of animated 3D characters, and Trzask's task was to find the golden mean between the TV ad and the style of the client's packshots. A seemingly simple matter, but when it comes to the size and weight of banners, it can turn out to be a real challenge.
Situations with disappearing legs, hands or eyes of our Przetworki were also common.

quote.text: ‚ÄûOptimizing Przetworki in such a way that it corresponds to the website guidelines on which our banners were to appear, was a real challenge. But in the end, we managed to make it on time and connect the worlds of TV and Internet advertisements!‚Äù

sections.title: Converting the idea into an ad

description.paragraph: Ultimately, we created ads with a bang. The goal of the first one was to expand brand awareness and the other engaged our recipients with its super mechanism. This ad served a carousel making smooth jam. Each recipient could help Przetworki by turning the carousel with a mouse (on a computer) or a finger (on a smartphone).
The super smoothness of the product has been emphasized by the sliding effect. We used waffles to create a slide, which was smeared with Przetworki jam.

quote.text: ‚ÄûHaving the client's consent for full creativity, we were able to let our imagination run wild and create something that we are very proud of. Projects with advertising aimed at children and their parents always give us a lot of joy!‚Äù

items.title: Advanced game in an ad? It‚Äôs possible!
caption: #design #animation #richmedia #games
Used to be music, now it's time for gaming! Read Tiger case study and find out how to enter gamers' world.

description.paragraph: Gaming - a topic that once was not so popular, now is one of the inherent elements of mainstream pop culture. So much that it beats music, that was once considered the voice of young generations. And they, as we all well know, can be capricious. Usually, they don‚Äôt sit in front of TV and are reluctant to interact with ads. They are a community brought up on healthy competition that they have learned by playing games. And with this approach, we created a Tiger ad they couldn't resist.

video.caption: Tiger - Game / Production: Trzask Studio  (concept, design, animation, programming) 2019

description.paragraph: Gamers are a target group that we know all too well. There are many of them in our company, and we are all too well aware of who we are! Therefore, when creating an ad promoting Tiger lottery, we had one goal in mind - it has to be so good that we will absolutely fall in love with it. As part of assets, the client provided us with their TV ad, thanks to which we could choose the direction of our creative concept.

text: give gamers what they like best!

video.caption: Tiger Speed Game (TV Advert), Production House: Witek Dajek / GrandFox

quote.text: ‚ÄûWe approached the subject ambitiously, very ambitiously. But knowing gamers who are often unavailable to marketers, we know too well that half measures are not an option. Either it will be big or not at all and we were sticking to the plan at all costs.‚Äù

sections.title: Thick ad in a lean format

description.paragraph: We decided that if gamers were to really get interested in this ad, it had to be in the form of a game. Without going to an additional page or installing an unnecessary app. Everything happened inside one and only banner, so we used a super extensive system of changing elements on the board, which allowed us to create a strong randomness of the game and different scenarios.

quote.text: ‚ÄûAll elements of the game have been carefully planned. Lots of combinations and moves depending on the users‚Äô choices. And of course - burning rubber with nitro. This is power!‚Äù

description.paragraph: And all this was closed in a pixel form that perfectly suited even the most demanding gaming fans. The sentiment to older titles is still alive among gamers, and this style, combined with dynamic animations and addictive gameplay, refreshed and gave it a modern twist.

left.title: What gaming tigers like the most?

description.paragraph: What was completely unique about Tiger's game is that it was programmed so that users could compete with each other, regardless of which page they displayed the ad on. As a result, the audience interacted with each other in real time and felt like they were playing it together.

quote.text: ‚ÄûOne person would be on Onet, the other on WP and they could compete against each other. The ranking was then displayed showing performance of the players who were currently playing the game.‚Äù

author.name: Weronika Bielecka
author.role: Responsible for the organization of the team's work

quote.text: ‚ÄûWe went all out when creating this banner. And with the client's faith in our abilities, it was so much easier to assume that there were no limits to creativity in this project. Thanks to it, this is one of the craziest and original ads we have created so far.‚Äù

items.title: Campaign that not only the youngest fell in love with
caption: #design #animation #richmedia #games
Check out Kubu≈õ case study and find out how the campaign awarded in the international IAC competition was created!

description.paragraph: Are the contents of juices, drinks and mousses as important for children as it is for their mothers? Turns out that yes! All you have to do is present it properly and involve the kids, and the rest will follow. Read on and you will find out how we created the ad for Kubu≈õ that granted us an award for the best rich media in the international IAC competition, in the Food category!

video.caption: Kubu≈õ - Play / Production: Trzask Studio  (concept, design, animation, programming) 2018

description.paragraph: Objective of the Kubu≈õ campaign, for which we were to prepare the materials, was very simple. Involve the target audience in the age of 8-12. Our ads had to encourage children to interact with them and to present a new offer of products from the wide Kubu≈õ portfolio. We received a TV ad from the client, which was our base for creating our rich media banners. Thanks to it, we were able to focus on creating concepts tailored to the brand's world.

video.caption: Kubu≈õ Play (TV Advert), Production House: Maspex, Agency: Brasil Warsaw, 3D/online/compositing: Badi Badi

quote.text: ‚ÄûThe concept of playable advertising seemed to be a perfect way to achieve this goal! Four creative ideas were defragmented into smaller parts, from which a series of rich media formats were created.‚Äù

sections.title: Rich media, or how to create extraordinary fun from an ordinary ad

description.paragraph: On a basis of previously accepted creative ideas, we created four mini-games that not only did their job great by involving the youngest, but also had a different, hidden goal. Each in its own way developed kids‚Äô reflexes and agility.

quote.text: ‚ÄûEach game had a different story, a different character, and a different... kind of fun. This meant that everyone could feel like a child. Literally.‚Äù

left.title: The Trzask Mechanism - a magical component of our ads

description.paragraph: How did we manage to create engaging games in advertising format? Well, you need a mysterious X component for that! We put a special mechanism in our banners, thanks to which we could program the game without burdening the weight of files.

Each of the mini-games worked on slightly different principles - in one, by clicking, recipients had to catch escaping raspberries, in the other, they had to arrange a bunch of grapes that had previously disintegrated before their eyes. In the third one, they had to hit mangoes and try to keep the fruity brand hero balanced. All ads worked on a similar principle of interaction - clicking the appropriate places on the ad. The difference was in the effect that the clicking gave.

quote.text: ‚ÄûThanks to our technology, we are able to slim down practically everything, It gives us many more possibilities and allows us to create much more interesting creations!‚Äù

description.paragraph: There are times when we just feel that something has to go right and that's what it was with the banners for Kubu≈õ. A few months later, our games were hailed as the best rich media campaign in the FMCG category at the famous international IAC Awards!

quote.text: ‚ÄûIt was definitely one of those campaigns that we will never forget. Especially when we realize how much the audience liked it!‚Äù

author.name: Weronika Bielecka
author.role: Responsible for the organization of the team's work

quote.text: ‚ÄûCan you be more proud of your project than we were when we found out about the win? I think not. It was a pleasure to create this ad for Kubu≈õ, and seeing what results it achieved made us want even more!‚Äù
